faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about System by Sections

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to get started.

addModules.question: Can we add modules later?
addModules.answer: Absolutely. Our modular approach means you can start with just the modules you need and add more as your requirements grow. You only pay for active modules.

powerBi.question: How do I connect with Power BI?
powerBi.answer: System by Sections includes a comprehensive REST API that integrates seamlessly with Power BI. We provide detailed documentation and can assist with the setup process.

dataCancel.question: What happens to our data if we cancel?
dataCancel.answer: Your data belongs to you. We provide full data export capabilities and will assist you in migrating your data if needed. We maintain backups for 90 days after cancellation.

userLimit.question: Is there a limit on the number of users?
userLimit.answer: No, there are no user limits. You can invite unlimited team members at no additional cost. You only pay the platform fee and module fees.

support.question: Do you provide training and support?
support.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive onboarding, training materials, and 24/7 support. Our team includes manufacturing experts who understand your industry challenges.
